short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online certificate generator that works with Chrome's TPM, and RUCKUS Cloudpath Enrollment System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to generate user or device certificates for managed Chromebooks. The certificate is generated via Cloudpath ES using its built-in PKI, or a third party PKI.

Note: This extension requires ChromeOS version 109 or newer, an internet connection, and requires that the extension be deployed via the management console (This means managed users and devices will see the extension automatically installed to their device per enterprise policy).

For more information, visit www.ruckusnetworks.com or contact RUCKUS Networks.

Use of this extension is governed by the Cloudpath EULA at https://xpc.cloudpath.net/documents/eula.pdf.  Use of this software signifies your acceptance of this agreement.
